Summary: sudden glare of object then got dimn then became bright again slowly moved no sound lots of light white and red glowing
divs: Sighting Detailsme and my brother whent outside to smoke a cigarette in the driveway when a sudden glare of light appeared in the sky very low to the groung then the glare reduced to a small and dimmer light we both entered the street and when we did the light became very bright again then reduced to a dimmer light once again object slowly started moving in are direction we started walking towards it so we could get a good look at what we were seeing we kept saying to each other is that a ufo while walking towards it once it passed over our heads we could see all the different lights and that it was so close to us and we didnt her any noise like plane engines we knew it wasnt a plane there was many lights when it passed over us and it had many flashing red lights then moved passed us and whent off into the distance behind trees with no sound or anything then i came in and wrote you guys (my feelings were excited shocked intense moments)(my brothers feelings scared shocked amused)
